dialogue_turns.speaker: Stars
dialogue_turns.text: Stars: they're just like us, but with way more fireplaces.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Stars: they're just like us, but with way more fireplaces.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: 1990, Madonna on the cover of Fortune magazine, labeled Europe's Smartest Business Woman.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: nineteen ninety, Madonna on the cover of Fortune magazine, labeled Europe's Smartest Business Woman.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1990: The year Madonna appeared on the cover of Forbes with the headline America's Smartest Business Woman?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, that's uh, a pretty bold statement for the time. And her net worth, according to that same magazine this past May, was calculated at 250 million dollars.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, that's uh, a pretty bold statement for the time. And her net worth, according to that same magazine this past May, was calculated at two hundred fifty million dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: $590 million: Madonnas net worth, as calculated this May by Forbes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which actually only puts her at number 86 among Europe's wealthiest self-made women, which is kind of surprising, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which actually only puts her at number eighty six among Europe's wealthiest self-made women, which is kind of surprising, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 36: Her rank among Americas wealthiest self-made women.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, you'd think she'd be higher. But then you see her tour numbers—over a million dollars gross per stop on average in the last year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, you'd think she'd be higher. But then you see her tour numbers-over a million dollars gross per stop on average in the last year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: $3,044,574: Madonnas average gross per tour stop over the past 36 months, according to Pollstar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And she only did twelve shows since the start of 2018. That's some serious earning power from just a handful of dates.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And she only did twelve shows since the start of twenty eighteen. That's some serious earning power from just a handful of dates.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 0: Number of shows played since the beginning of 2017.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's the Vimeo stats—2.6 million average daily views? That's massive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's the Vimeo statsminus two point six million average daily views? That's massive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1.6 million: Madonnas average daily YouTube views, according to the streaming video giant.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and 'Material Girl' alone has 48 million total views on there. It's wild how her old hits still pull those numbers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and 'Material Girl' alone has forty eight million total views on there. It's wild how her old hits still pull those numbers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But only one of her albums is certified Platinum by the RIAA for moving over ten million units—'Like a Virgin'.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But only one of her albums is certified Platinum by the R I A A for moving over ten million units-'Like a Virgin'.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 2: Number of her albums certified Diamond by the RIAA for moving 10 million-plus units (Like a Virgin and The Immaculate Collection).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which is still huge, obviously. And then we get to the real estate—her Malibu home is actually four mansions mashed together.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which is still huge, obviously. And then we get to the real estate-her Malibu home is actually four mansions mashed together.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 3: Number of townhouses mashed together to create Madonnas triple-wide Manhattan home, purchased for $40 million in 2009.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Purchased for 60 million back in 2012. And it has, what, five fireplaces?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Purchased for sixty million back in twenty twelve. And it has, what, five fireplaces?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 3: Number of townhouses mashed together to create Madonnas triple-wide Manhattan home, purchased for $40 million in 2009. 9: Number of fireplaces in the aforementioned townhouse.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Five fireplaces, yeah. I mean, why not, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Five fireplaces, yeah. I mean, why not, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And she's got 41 acting credits to her name, which is a lot more than people probably realize.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And she's got forty one acting credits to her name, which is a lot more than people probably realize.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 91: Acting credits in short films, TV shows and feature films.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And in 'Evita' alone, she had 15 costume changes. The dedication is real.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And in 'Evita' alone, she had fifteen costume changes. The dedication is real.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 85: Total costume changes by Madonna in Evita.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Eighteen Golden Globe nominations, three wins. Not too shabby for a pop star crossing over.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eighteen Golden Globe nominations, three wins. Not too shabby for a pop star crossing over.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then there's the charity side—she raised 1.5 million at a London event in 2017 for her cancer research facility in Paris.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's the charity side-she raised one point five million at a London event in twenty seventeen for her cancer research facility in Paris.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: $7.5 million: Total raised by Madonna at a 2016 event in Miami to help fund her pediatric medical facility in Malawi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which has performed 590 treatments since it started. That's… that's actually really impressive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which has performed five hundred ninety treatments since it started. That's... that's actually really impressive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 1,690: Number of pediatric surgeries performed at the aforementioned facility since its opening.

artist_script:
Stars: they're just like us, but with way more fireplaces.
HostA: 1990, Madonna on the cover of Fortune magazine, labeled Europe's Smartest Business Woman.
HostB: Oh wow, that's uh, a pretty bold statement for the time. And her net worth, according to that same magazine this past May, was calculated at 250 million dollars.
HostA: Which actually only puts her at number 86 among Europe's wealthiest self-made women, which is kind of surprising, right?
HostB: Yeah, you'd think she'd be higher. But then you see her tour numbers—over a million dollars gross per stop on average in the last year.
HostA: And she only did twelve shows since the start of 2018. That's some serious earning power from just a handful of dates.
HostB: And then there's the Vimeo stats—2.6 million average daily views? That's massive.
HostA: Right, and 'Material Girl' alone has 48 million total views on there. It's wild how her old hits still pull those numbers.
HostB: But only one of her albums is certified Platinum by the RIAA for moving over ten million units—'Like a Virgin'.
HostA: Which is still huge, obviously. And then we get to the real estate—her Malibu home is actually four mansions mashed together.
HostB: Purchased for 60 million back in 2012. And it has, what, five fireplaces?
HostA: Five fireplaces, yeah. I mean, why not, right?
HostB: And she's got 41 acting credits to her name, which is a lot more than people probably realize.
HostA: And in 'Evita' alone, she had 15 costume changes. The dedication is real.
HostB: Eighteen Golden Globe nominations, three wins. Not too shabby for a pop star crossing over.
HostA: And then there's the charity side—she raised 1.5 million at a London event in 2017 for her cancer research facility in Paris.
HostB: Which has performed 590 treatments since it started. That's… that's actually really impressive.
